Title: Blinded
Actors: Najwa Nimri, Alfredo Villa, Ramón Barea, Elena Irureta
Plot: Marrubi works at a dry cleaners and suffers unwanted advances from her boss, Clemente. She's also an ETA commando. And so is her lover, Mikel. But she betrays her terrorist group; and she and Mikel end up on the run. The police want her behind bars; the terrorists want her dead. Marrubi takes refuge with her son at Clemente's mansion, but her troubles are far from over.
